title: Priceable Trait Parameters
description: Configuration contract for pricing, currency, and billing cadence metadata.

supportedCurrencies.description: ISO 4217 currency codes supported for pricing.

items.description: Uppercase three-letter ISO currency code (e.g., USD).

defaultCurrency.description: Currency preselected when authoring pricing information.

pricingModels.description: Supported monetization strategies applied to the entity.

items.description: Pricing model identifier such as one_time or subscription.

billingIntervals.description: Allowed billing cadences when the pricing model recurs.

items.description: Billing interval identifier such as month or year.

taxBehavior.description: Determines whether prices are tax inclusive or exclusive.
